Articles.Content: What do you guys think about jacksepticeye playing ksp do you think it's good for the game or bad from the way he plays it?

> 
> What do you guys think about jacksepticeye playing ksp do you think it's good for the game or bad from the way he plays it?

Good and bad. Good as he has a lot of subscribers so lots of eyes. Bad because he makes it look very hard to play. Due to his newness to the game. That may put a few people off.

> 
> Good and bad. Good as he has a lot of subscribers so lots of eyes. Bad because he makes it look very hard to play. Due to his newness to the game. That may put a few people off.

Well, if I was new, I'd rather know the truth than a marketing lie. If I was doing a video series on KSP, I'd rather let people know it's hard so that they don't go spend their money and think it's gonna be easy. People who want a hard game might also be turned away thinking it's easy. Also, showing that it's hard keeps the riff-raff out of the forums. N0ot the new guys who are genuinely interested and want to learn, but the trolls and the 9-10 year olds who just want people to do everything for them so that they don't have to learn.

His progress seems to be too slow. I'm kind of tired of youtubers who make KSP look like incredibly difficult game which can give satisfaction only when you explode stuff on the launchpad.

Hopefully he'll get better with KSP.
good it gets people to ksp to help support the makers and his videos are funny (i can see why people wouldnt like him though)
Oh! Oh! I love that guy! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) He is one of the best KSP'ers out there, even though he uploads videos pretty rarely.

> 
> Oh! Oh! I love that guy! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) He is one of the best KSP'ers out there, even though he uploads videos pretty rarely.

He ain't got nothing on Robbaz though. Now he really releases videos rarely sadly.

> 
> His progress seems to be too slow. I'm kind of tired of youtubers who make KSP look like incredibly difficult game which can give satisfaction only when you explode stuff on the launchpad.
> Hopefully he'll get better with KSP.

this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I discovered KSP when Markiplier played it. I only saw a few videos, and I didn't care if he made it look hard. I mean, I would NEVER put a game off just because it "Looks hard" because it looked easy to learn, because he learned how to go to the Mun in a few episodes.

I know who Jack and Mark are, but I was introduced to KSP by Scott Manley.

Also, don't forget we don't want this site turning into 4chan because there are too many trolls brought in by people who make the game look easy.

(Also, I LOVE Mark.)
I can understand why people enjoy him, but I personally can't stand to watch his videos for more than a few minutes at a time (ironic given the fact that I love Venturiantales and Tobuscus)

> 
> He ain't got nothing on Robbaz though. Now he really releases videos rarely sadly.

I love robbaz! His original ksp video back when the center had palm trees and six parts convinced me to buy the game back when it was still $7. Best $7 I ever spent. 

Sadly, his really old ksp vids are private now. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Oh! Oh! I love that guy! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) He is one of the best KSP'ers out there, even though he uploads videos pretty rarely.

I think he just tries to have a good mix of things (And, me being a subscriber of over a year, I've seen he does have a good mix). KSP videos by him, Robbaz, and other rare uploaders I tend to like, but videos from channels that are dedicated to or upload a majority of KSP videos I don't like very much. Of course, that's just my opinion, but I think he's doing a pretty good job of keeping a good mix of things so that everybody has something that they watch and like on a regular basis.

The list of my top 5 KSP players on Youtube:

--------------------------------------------------

1. Scott Manley

2. Robbaz

3. Jacksepticeye

4. Danny2462

5. SWDennis

--------------------------------------------------

If so, which one was your favourite?
